quotes: Gounden was also involved in the Madagascar mediation in 2012/3.
Daniel Forti joined ACCORD in 2011 as a research intern,
then worked as a junior researcher from 2012 until 2015.
the rise of African nationalism and nationalist consciousness in Tanganyika and Zanzibar began in the 1940s,
reached fever pitch in the 1950s.
Tanganyika was first colonised as part of the German East Africa colony from 1885 to 1918.
By the 1880s, Zanzibar was under Arab rule.
from 1945 to 1961 it was a trusteeship territory under the UN.
